p: Branches with leaves of G. rosmarinifolia were collected in February 2017 from plants located in the following site: “Raffo Rosso, Monte Cuccio, and Vallone Sagana” (38°11’07”N 13°16’05” E—Sicily—Palermo). The matrices were placed in paper bags and kept at 4 ± 1 °C for 24 hours before the hydrodistillation. A voucher specimen (N° MS 120/2017) was deposited at the Herbarium of the University of Palermo. No specific permits were required for the described location and for the collection of plant material. The plant species used in the present study is not endangered or protected.
